## Create a plot

# Require libraries
```{r}
#|label: libraries
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| label: import data
#get palmerpenguins data
data <- palmerpenguins::penguins
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-height-effect
#| fig-cap: height of Bistorta vivipara for ambient and warm treatment
#| fig-height: 5.2

ggplot(bistorta_height, aes(x = Treatment, y = Value)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "grey80") +
  labs(x = "Treatment", y = "Height cm")
```
